titles.title: SF398 There is a Spirit in the air

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1 There's a spirit in the air,
telling Christians everywhere:
'Praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working in our world!'

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2 Lose your shyness, find your tongue,
tell the world what God has done.
God in Christ has come to stay,
Live tomorrow's life today

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3 When believers break the bread,
when a hungry child is fed,
praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working, in our world.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
4 Still the Spirit gives us light,
seeing wrong and setting right:
God in Christ has come to stay.
Live tomorrow's life today!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
5 When a stranger's not alone,
where the homeless find a home,
praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working, in our world.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
6 May the Spirit fill our praise,
guide our thoughts and change our ways.
God in Christ has come to stay.
Live tomorrow's life today

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
7 There's a Spirit in the air,
calling people everywhere:
praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working, in our world.
Brian Wren (b. 1936)
